thread.title: Big Buck World Championship Announces Hard Rock Cafe Chicago as OFFICIAL Venue of the 2015 Big Buck World Championship and Old Wisconsin Sweepstakes!
thread.title_full: Big Buck World Championship Announces Hard Rock Cafe Chicago as OFFICIAL Venue of the 2015 Big Buck World Championship and Old Wisconsin Sweepstakes!

author: admin
title: Big Buck World Championship Announces Hard Rock Cafe Chicago as OFFICIAL Venue of the 2015 Big Buck World Championship and Old Wisconsin Sweepstakes!
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Big Buck HD 
GLEN ELLYN, Ill., Sept. 4, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- This year, the Eighth Annual Big Buck World Championship has landed its biggest venue yet! The Hard Rock cafe, in the heart of Chicago, has been announced as the OFFICIAL venue of the biggest party of the year. The Hard Rock is known for its walls covered in historical memorabilia and now an official venue for the Big Buck World Championship. On October 23(rd) and 24(th), Big Buck competitors will take their shot at over $75,000 in prizes. That's right, the prize pool has increased to over $75,000 thanks to Old Wisconsin meat snacks, an official World Championship sponsor. Not only has Old Wisconsin thrown more cash into the pool, but they have also announced an exclusive sweepstakes that will result in one lucky fan winning their very own Big Buck HD! 
Hunt for more flavor by snagging specially marked packages of Old Wisconsin meat snacks! Register to enter the exclusive promo code found in your package of meat snacks. Not only will you receive FREE gameplay, but you will also be automatically entered to win your very own BIG BUCK HD and receive coupons to save on future meat snack packs. Learn more about the Hunt for More Flavor Sweepstakes by visiting bigbuckhd.com/meatsnacks 
Keep up to date on the latest Big Buck Hunter World Championship news by visiting www.bigbuckhd.com . 
About Big Buck HD 
Big Buck HD is the first-ever 1080p high definition arcade video game and was created by Raw Thrills and Play Mechanix, developers of coin-operated interactive entertainment products. Combining the best of the companies' prior hits, Big Buck Hunter Pro and Big Buck Safari, Big Buck HD offers enhanced graphics as well as new challenges, awards and tournaments. Big Buck HD arcade games feature online connectivity, allowing players to track scores and compete against players from across the country for cash prizes. 
For additional information, visit www.bigbuckhd.com/world , like us on Facebook facebook.com/OfficialBigBuckHunter, follow our tweets twitter.com/bigbuckhunter and love our instagram photos instagram.com/bigbuckhunter 
The Championship event will be broadcast live on twitch.tv. 
Keep up to date on the latest Big Buck Hunter World Championship news by visiting www.bigbuckhd.com .
